website_summaries.verdict: This steam sterilizer gives you options, with settings for sterilizing, drying, and deodorizing. It also gives you 3 different set-up options, so you can fit a variety of baby products for cleaning.
pros: Kills 99.9 percent of bacteria, germs and microbes
Disinfects at a higher temperature than most dishwashers, using penetrating steam
Settings for sterilizing, drying, and deodorizing
Offers 3 set-up configurations to better fit pacifiers, teethers, bottles, and plastic toys
Keeps items sanitized in sterile environment for more than 12 hours
cons: Can be challenging to fit tall bottles like those from Dr. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Medela steam bags since my son was born. They work just fine but I grew tired of waiting for my parts to dry. I didn’t necessarily want to spend $70, but I thought “maybe the convenience is worth it”. I am so glad I gave it a chance. I can’t say enough good things about this sterilizer. The drying feature works INCREDIBLY WELL and even gets all of the nipples completely dry. Much bigger than I was expecting (that was a good thing) and fits absolutely everything I need to steam for the day in one go around. Extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissPIA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was the only sterilizer and dryer we could find. How is it possible no other company has come up with that idea? I hated the idea of having to air dry my baby's stuff afterwards. But this solves the problem beautifully. No complaints here. It does the job perfectly. Not a single drop of water on my baby's stuff (unless you don't know how to follow directions and place the items in the wrong direction). Worth every dime! I feel bad for parents who don't have a dryer in their sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: ClassyCurly

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizes and dries in one hour!
customer_reviews.text: This Papablic baby botttle sterilizer and drier does the job in one hour. As others have noted, the control dial is hard to turn. The drying part is pretty loud, but only because a fan is involved. Everything is dried with the “extra dry” setting. I previously had another model which only sterilizes, and it was a pain to wait for the bottles to hang dry over several hours, which leaves water marks if the water droplets are not first washed away with warm water. This sterilizer and drier is only slightly more expensive than the one without the drier. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, the heating plate looks rusty after every use and bottles do NOT come out looking even remotely clean, even if I rinse well beforehand there is always stuff caked inside the bottles, felt dangerous to continue using for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Kalil

customer_reviews.title: Not happy all around.
customer_reviews.text: Yes the productive is easy to use but I would not give it to any one and I wish I could return mine. There was water build up, the orange rust everyone is talking about, after the two uses and it has not gone away since! I’ve cleaned it numerous times. Also, for the bottles to come out clean with no residue at all you basically have to completely scrub and hand wash them so at that point you might as well just hand wash them and not even bother with this. Bottles do not always come out totally dry, they are either still wet or have water spots. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Young

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it every single day, sometimes multiple times per day. It a large and capable of fitting all my "stuff" (bottles, nipples, breast pump accessories, pacifiers, NoseFrida) in one sterilizing batch. Its super simple to use and easy to clean. I make sure I wipe down the heating disc with a papertowel before and after every use to prevent rust and minimize build-up. I only use distilled water with this product. The unit makes some noise, but nothing more that what i expected it to. Overall, very pleased with this purchase. If, for some reason, this product does not hold up, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: FIRST TIME MOM APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I waited this long (4months) to finally buy a sterilizer !!! This is the best purchase I have made so far!! It fits all my bottles, and they come out dry plus pacifier and toys!! It looks good the color is very pretty, it’s a baby blue color. I never go back to boiling bottles, this machine saves me so much time. The instructions are easy so nothing complicated. Many users are saying that the button is hard to turn, but I haven’t had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Heat plate gets rusty
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a month and the heating plate started rusting. The plate is metal, and water goes on it - why would they make a product that is designed to have water on it with a metal that rusts. I kept using the product, but today, I found brown residue inside the steamer basket - this means that it's getting into the sterilized bottles. Now I have to worry about my baby being poisoned from metal.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Brouer

customer_reviews.title: Plate peeling after a dozen uses
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until the plate coating started to peel off after only a dozen uses. Then the peeling got on the baby bottles. I’m very disappointed. I even used distilled water for each cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: The heat plate turned rusty within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is easy to use. However, the heat plate got rusty only after 3 weeks since we started using it. The photo I attached is the plate after cleaning (so you could imagine it looked much worse originally). I could have bought Evan sterilizer which also has the same problem but is cheaper if I knew this sterilizer would be rusted as well. I chose this one only because every photo in customer reviews looked perfect. If you don’t like a rusty heat plate in your sterilizer, do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Chen Chia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever for a pumping/working/busy mom! I wash bottles at night for daycare the next day and this totally beats boiling or those microwave bags that only hold 2 bottles! This is perfect for his teething toys too! My only regret is that I did not order sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyto4boys

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely sure it sanitizes
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly easy to use. And the build quality seems pretty good. It just doesn't get very hot. I can hold my hand next to the exhaust hole, and it doesn't hurt. I was hoping for steam like that of a pot on the stove. So... We still clean everything before putting in here. Really no point in using this, except we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I loved this thing at first. It has always been super easy to use. The quality just has not held up. I would say after two or three weeks it started to deteriorate pretty quickly. I never used anything but distilled water and it still rusted-out in the bottom. The plastic top has warped and barely stays together now. It's been 4 months. I should have just returned it but with a newborn who has time for that?!! I'll keep searching for a good bottle cleaner I guess.... Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: The Simple Baby Life

customer_reviews.title: Good product but some something need to be improved
customer_reviews.text: I use Dr Brown 8 oz bottles, and they are a little too big for this sterilizer. When the bottle in the main basket, the small basket cannot be put on. Besides, the bottles are not dried evenly especially for the middle 2 bottle holders. It takes extra time to dry these two while the others are desiccated. This is why I rate it 4 stas, otherwise it is OK. Quality looks good and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love that it dries the bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I thought this would be a time saver to reduce the effort needed to wash the bottles. I didn’t think I still had to Wash the bottles, then put them in to Sanitize. I do feel better about using sanitized bottles and it holds all of them at once. I am also happy with the dry function which is nice so I can start it before bed and not have to worry about them being enclosed and wet all night. I suppose it was worth the purchase price. Especially if you have an “at risk” baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jayann Wright

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the competing models...
customer_reviews.text: Bought both this one and the Dr. Brown's steamer, and this one was hands down the winner. Ease of use, and the dryer give it a big step over the competition. Dr. Brown's did not dry the bottles. We've been using our unit for about 3 months, and it has put my wife's sterilization worries at ease. Bottles come out sterilized and dry every time. It does take up a 8"x12" space on your counter, but it's completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Raju

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to keep clean even when following the cleaning instructions.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this item 2 months. We only use distilled water. It gets nasty (like brown stuff all over it). The bottles come out smelling burnt and even get some of the down stuff on it. This started after the first week in use and has progressively gotten worse! And now the brown rust items are leaking underneath and staining my countertops. We have to completely disassemble and clean 3 times a week and now the heating element is corroding.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Highly  recommend - Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product after the disappointing purchase of the DrBrowns sanitizer. The dryer feature is definitely awesome I mean who wants a bunch of wet bottles. Beware the 8oz Drbrown bottles do not fit if your using the additional basket in the top (small parts compartment) which is unfortunate because then you have to run two separate cycles instead of just one. Overall very satisfied!!. UPDATE * ran into a issue after about 6 months of use, however I contacted the customer support of Papablic directly and they were BEYOND helpful. I have seriously never received such great customer service. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!!! I love that it sterilizes and dries my bottles/parts. So in the morning - after I pump - I just place these items in this device - and in an hour, I have clean/dry bottles. I don’t have to wait for them to dry OR physically dry them myself. Also - the customer service is amazing. I had a problem with this device after using it for months - I called them up and they immediately sent a replacement! I got a brand new item within a few days. Stop looking - and just purchase this. You’ll be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anil B. Kabrawala

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for 3 months. Now the dial has stopped working, so rather than the machine shutting off on it's own, we have to set a manual timer on our phone so we remember to turn it off. If you want the sterilizer to work more than 3 months, dont buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: kamp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: For $70, you’d expect a great quality product but that’s not the case. I’ve been using this sterilizer for almost 3 months now and while the hot plate looked rusty from the getgo, it worked great. All of a sudden the dial doesn’t work anymore, so the whole unit is done. What a terrible quality...
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Eighmy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have for moms!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I use it daily. It’s not too big, my counter space is limited but this fits and has a compact footprint. Love that it’s a nice big rectangular shape, makes it easy to pack with bottles and cups. Love the stacking feature of the top tray and lid. It’s quiet, it’s fast and it dries everything! Originally I had the Baby Brezza Sterilizer, but the dome shape and inner rack were problematic and it actually broke after 6 months... replaced it with this Papablic and love it so much more! Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Dodger Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beware** Only good for drying
customer_reviews.text: Find myself back to cleaning bottles like I did prior to receiving this. Honestly the only thing to use this for is the dryer which takes 45 mins but I wish someone said this prior to me buying it because it seems to sanitize only clean bottles and if your looking for a system to clean sanitize and dry this isn’t it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Please Read
customer_reviews.text: We followed directions and it told us to run the machine twice before using. When went to sterilize and dry it didn’t dry throughly so we tried to just use the dryer part and still not dry. Not impressed with this at all. Not sure if it defective or what! Update: very impressed with the customer service! They sent a new one and it is working as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Herring

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product!! We bought it when our Balla Bebé suddenly stopped working after 6 weeks of use. I have to say with use this sterilizer quite often (2-3 times per day) and has been working perfectly fine for almost 2 months. It is quite, easy to clean and does the work. A little bit big and bulky but it is perfect for small and big bottles (8 Oz bottles fit perfectly). I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Victoria Iribarren

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn got thrush because we were boiling her bottles in a pot on the stove and leaving them out. This fixed that. It is easy to use and we can leave her bottles inside until we need them. Love the different sections so I can sterilize everything, but it not get all jumbled up. Works well but very quickly. Gets build up on the plate, but wipes off easily. Lets out quite a bit of steam, so would recommend keeping it an open space.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.... can’t really put a price on that.
customer_reviews.text: It dries items well, it holds a lot of them and works quickly. A simple sterilize cycle is just 8ish minutes. A full dry cycle is 45 minutes. With two kids, it is great to run things through this to supplement my own cleaning or if one of us gets a cold.
customer_reviews.author: TK421

customer_reviews.title: A must have product for sterilizer and drying baby products
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for more than a month and below is the summary. Like: 1. It looks great. Nice design and a sturdy product. 2. Works very well with sterilizer and drying process. 3. Nice design having different compartments with plenty of space. 4. Very easy to clean base. Just need to put white vinegar to clean base plate. Dislike: 1. Base plate collects white residual after evertime we use this despite of we thoroughly clear the bottles and accessories with mild soap evertime and put only filtered water for sterilizer. 2. Nob that is used to adjust process is quite tough to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Product is giving burning smell
customer_reviews.text: This product worked good earlier but now it always gives burning smell eventhough we fill the water at correct level. The water plate have burning markes now. I can return it but with all Coronavirus going on I can't even go to store. Amazon have closed the call and no one providing solution on chat.
customer_reviews.author: Shweta Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for about 6 months now. Fits 6 Dr. Brown bottles (must tilt them in a circle pattern). We hand wash the bottles and all the parts. Everything fits in the lower and upper compartments with some spare room for pacifiers or other little extras if needed. It doesn’t take up much counter space. It’s pretty quiet. Very easy to operate and clean. I wanted a sanitizer that would also dry the bottles and parts and this does just that. It’s been exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Heating plates burns-horrible smell. Getting replacement from company after contacting directly.
customer_reviews.text: While using this product I smelt a horrible burning smell. After it finished the sterilization process I removed all my bottles/nipples/lids and lifted the bottom to see the heating plate had completely burned! I contacted the company and they were amazing, they ended up sending me a replacement one to try again. We will see how the replacement one is once it arrives but they did say I may have a defective one so just beware there have been issues with the heating plate.
customer_reviews.author: hattan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived used. Scale stains on the boiler plate, scratches on the lid, box contents in disarray and out of their plastic bags. It's a hygiene product for my infant, so I'm not jazzed that it was used and returned by some rando. Now I have to make a trip to UPS to return. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Shamalbek

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend- worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: For our daughter, we used a microwaveable bottle sanitizer and put them on a drying rack. It was a giant pain and we were hoping to find something better for our second child. I found this and it had good reviews, so we decided to pull the trigger- and I am SO glad we did. Not only does it look super sleek and hide the bottle clutter on our kitchen counter, but it sanitizes and dries bottles like a dream. We use 8 oz size Dr. Brown’s bottles and we can fit 9 of them inside (probably no more than that), including all the other bottle components in the top basket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Waechter

customer_reviews.title: We use this every day!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for sanitizing all bottles, bottle parts, and pumping parts. My wife sells her extra milk since she over produces and the donation places have sanitation standards so we bought this to make sure everything is sterile! So far we love it! Works great, lots of space. The heating element does need to be scrubbed about every other use, otherwise it gets gunky, but if you wipe it regularly it stays nice! Avoid using anything abrasive on the heating element surface because it will scratch it! Use as directed and you'll be very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Functions Well
customer_reviews.text: Update- I was able to contact their customer service and they offered to replace my unit, standing behind their product, which is fantastic so I am changing my review. Glad to have found a company that provides great customer support. I purchased this item 5 months ago. The bottle sterilizer and dryer functions are easy to use. I do wish that I could dry without sterilizing. I am disappointed that the rubber in the base has broken down, not sure what caused this as I have only been gently cleaning it and using distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: DecFlower CA

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money!! I previously had an Avent bottle sterilizer. Don’t even waste your money on one of those! I assumed all sterilizers would disinfect and then dry the bottles. I was wrong! It is a pain to run them through the sterilizer only to have to hand dry the pieces! I love that this sterilizes AND dries all the pump parts and pieces. I can easily fit three sets of 8oz Medela bottles and pump pieces in the sterilizer, and they all come out perfectly dry. It saves so much time compared to having to hand dry every piece before pumping!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Boarman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kitchen more organised than microwave steriliser
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Philips microwave steriliser used for kids 1 and 2. I upgraded to this for #3 With my old microwave steriliser bottles/pump parts were always in a system of waiting to go in it or sitting on a drying rack having come out of it and been wet had to air dry. And I used to burn myself at least once a week being impatient to empty the stuff out when too hot to get another load in. I love this one I upgraded to for baby #3 - takes decent size load and stuff comes out dry ready to go away. Kitchen is less cluttered.. saves time and space.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for preemie babies.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 34 week old healthy baby girl in the Nicu. I had preeclampsia and was unable to keep her in past 34. Since her sucking was not fully developed, I cannot breastfeed. So, I decided to pump. It is important to have sanitized and sterilization of tools and bottles are very important. This makes life so much easier and puts premie mommies at ease. I’m so glad I bought this. You must wash your items before you use the machine. It’s that extra step you have to be willing to do for your baby. It’s all worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: HarryPotterfanatic192

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Recommend using distilled water only to maximize use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sterilizer/dryer. It is quiet and gets everything clean and dry. Very easy to load and use. The turn knob is tight so if you have any weakness or hand issues it might be difficult to use because it isn’t as simple as pushing a button. Totallly recommend using distilled water only. The water heater is flat and buildup accumulates rapidly. Easy to clean. Directions are online with videos. Watch them first for best use! Though the machine has a great design and is very intuitive in operation, it doesn’t hurt to know the loading recommendations and cleaning instructions before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindahl

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This thing is FIRE! It’s my number one favorite baby item. I bought this when I was pregnant looking for something to be able to sanitize my comotomos- they are wide and awkward. This thing works perfect for them. It also fits all my pump parts no problem. The little top rack is awesome for nipples and pacifiers. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: ADS

customer_reviews.title: Best sterilizer! Great drying function!
customer_reviews.text: I tried other sterilizers and this is the best so far. I like the fact that it has a big capacity unlike others where you have to keep on running bottles several times. The fact that it can dry it as well is huge! It was ao annoying that other sterilizers leave bottles still wet and you have to dry them which is an extra step. The only comment i have is that when you sterilize tall dr. Brown bottles you wont be able to close it if you put it on the installed racks. However you can still put the bottles and run them fine but not on the racks. Overall, this is worth the money! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MS  Veazie

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottle Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my bottle sanitizer but after 5 months it stopped working. I got in contact with papablic customer service and they responded right away. I told them what had happened and they sent me a new one I got it in two days. Customer service was super nice I had no problems at all they fixed my issue right away im so happy because I love this bottle sanitizer it dryes my bottles it doesn't leave any water. Even though it stopped working now I got a new replacement and I'm super happy that is why I still give it five stars they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: David Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: Liked this overall and would have given it 5 stars, but recently switched to some taller bottles that make it impossible to steam the smaller items at the same time. (Dr. Brown's bottles over 120 ml). Not sure if others have had the issue, but this means to use the bottles, I'd have to steam the bottles separately from the nipples and other accessories. They only needed to make the larger section maybe a half inch taller to accommodate the larger bottles for use with the accessory tray. Still would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonVoyager

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT dry items as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This DOES NOT dry. That was my sole reason for purchasing. Pretty frustrated. It also takes 45 min to cycle thru. I’ve even run it over night and the pieces are still wet in the morning. Boiling water on the stove takes less time so I really may as well go back to that since they both require drying time. I gave two stars because it’s easier and less water waste than the dishwasher plus it’s quiet. I’ve been using for almost a month about 3x per week. Leaning toward returning it and finding a different one that is more reliable about drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sterilizer!
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is very easy to use and the steam chamber is very large and holds a lot baby items - bottles, pacifiers, breast pump machine parts (NOT the electrical parts!), etc. It has a big bottom chamber that has notches for holding bottles and it has a tray that sits on top to hold the small items. You just fill it up, pour a small amount of distilled water under the steam chamber box, and turn it on. Tip - I set the lid on it upside down while I'm filling it with washed items throughout the day. That way, others know the items inside have not yet been sterilized. I turn it on once it's full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews on this sterilizer and numerous others. I narrowed it down to three and the other two were much more expensive. This sterilizer is great. It holds at least six bottles and all of the pieces. I have only used the first dry setting and all of my items have come out perfectly dry each time, so I haven't needed to use the second setting. It is easy to load, easy to clean, and works fairly quickly. It is rather large, so be prepared to make room for it on your counter. With twins, I appreciate the large capacity and that everything stays upright.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver with a newborn. It sanitized the bottles while I take care of my little guy and it’s super easy to clean, just water and white vinegar which costs less than $2 a gallon. We use it at least twice a day for the past few months. We love this thing, the other ones might be cheaper but there’s no substitute for ease of use when you have a baby
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: super inconvenient.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I cannot give this item five stars since I had an issue with it to begin with. However, the seller reached out and is honoring the warranty. If you're interested in getting this, buy without reservation, as the seller stands by their product. Good to know they care about their customers. ORIGINAL: Every time I try to prep my bottles, I always have to run it for a little extra time to get the bottles to dry all the way... super inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tej

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really do the job it states
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece, as they have a new baby.. It does not clean the bottles worth a darn, however if they first wash them either in the dishwasher or by hand, this will now Sterilize them.. That's the only use here. I asked her if she wanted to return it, and she stated that it was usable as a sterilizer so she would keep it..
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know what to do now as I bought this barely a year ago for my pregnant wife to bring to her country. After only a few usages recently, it still lights up but produces no heat.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pham

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for 90days and all of sudden stopped working. There is no way we can either return or request replacement. The reason i gave one star is as it worked fine for 90days. Not durable product. Please keep away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing device.
customer_reviews.text: When we started parenting we didn’t know 90 percent of the stuffs, but one thing we knew for sure. the sterilization of everything That baby touches. We started with one device that had a rigid 8 minutes of sterilization and we used it for a while but we were always struggling making everything inside the machine dry, it was definitely defeating the purpose because of the use of something not sterilized to dry the utensils. Then we found this product, not only has the ability to dry everything, on top of that, we feel like it does a better job and you can easily adjust the timer in case you want more time. My family will definitely recommend this Product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Beyra

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: I think any parent would appreciate this device. It has saved us a lot of counter space and speeds up the drying efforts about 20x. Not to mention it sterilizes to a degree everything in there. I like how they designed it so that you can just do only the small tray as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Time saving life saving countertop miracle!
customer_reviews.text: THIS. PRODUCT. IS. LIFE. After washing and boiling bottles for one baby, for our next go around, we had to do something different. So we ordered this sterilizer. We run it once or twice a day, and we have SOOOOOOOOO much more time. We actually get to breathe about 3 times between diapers and feedings! Thanks Papablic! We're telling our friends! And, regarding those pictures that some people have posted of discolored heating elements... We just use the samepurified water we already use with the formula, and, 2 months later, our element looks brand new. If that's what it's doing to your heading element, um, you might want to get that tested before you drink it. Just sayin'...
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3rd use!
customer_reviews.text: The dial stopped working after the third use. It stayed stuck on the drying function and would not shut off. I noticed this when I woke up in the morning and the dryer was still going, after 6 hours. I tested it again in case it was user error and it still would not move from the drying phase. The first two times I used it the dial would make a winding sound similar to a wind up timer. After the third use there was no more winding sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Cheese Head

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for about two months...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I almost love it for the drying feature alone. Didn’t have a sterilizer for our first, but glad we purchased this time around! UPDATE: I originally gave this 5 stars. Started out great! However, we have been using it for only two months and it no longer dries our items all the way. I cleaned it weekly as recommended too. It also seems that there is sometimes a film on the items, even though I thoroughly clean the items before placing them in there. Also, the paint around the front dial is fading (this doesn’t affect the product working, just something of note). Again, loved at first, and maybe we received a defective one, but am disappointed now.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia D.

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and space.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has saved lots of time! We no longer have to manually dry the bottles or pump parts anymore. The machine sterilization and dry process of 45 minutes setting is great. Even pacifiers are sterilized. I have used this product for a few days now and multiple times in a day. Added a video to this review with drying in progress. Warm air was flowing up in thw short clip. Easy to use and clean. Use vinegar and water to clean the base if it gets white and rusty look.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowverse

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: We used to use the sanitizer u throw in the microwave but the one we bought leaked so after much debate went with this version. Great decision! Having a device that sanitizes and dries just takes one precious step out of the process and of course with a newborn every minute saved is priceless. It does take up quite a bit of space but no more than the footprint of the sanitizers we had before. Some have commented on the build up on the heating element but we use distilled water and it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ito

customer_reviews.title: Get it. It will save your insanity
customer_reviews.text: I love this sanitizer!!!! We actually bought one and it was giving me an issue where it wasn’t hot enough. I contacted customer service and Ryan email me back within one day! I just have to provide him with my amazon order number and he shipped out another machine within 3 days I received it!!!! The sanitizer saved me soooooooo much time. After using it everyday 3-4 times a day for the past 6 months, the machine is still new!!! I decals the machine once every two weeks with white vinegar just like the instruction. I love it so much that I even tell my girlfriends to get for her babies.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. It would gave been better if designed to fit all bottle components in one go. For example, it takes six bottles but on the top shelf it does not have space for the six bottle nipples, caps and rings. So depending on bottle types, multiple cycles needed to sanitize and in tge interim the bottles are half cleaned while their caps are being sanitized. The only bottles you can clean in one go are Medela storage or Dr. Brown bottles. The rest don’t fit in one go as all components of a bottle go.
customer_reviews.author: Ragsgold

customer_reviews.title: This little thing worked awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I read tons of reviews on this and several other electric steamers. At first I bought a microwave one and I'm glad I returned it. This one was more expensive but I think I really made a good buy it fits lots of stuff very easy to use and doesn't take forever. I've never had anything come out with water still on it or in it. It fits all of my breast pump parts. All sizes and shaped bottles, all of our glass and plastic feeding and food storage containers. Never melted or messed up anything. Not too bulky either we highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow mommy

customer_reviews.title: Really, really like this
customer_reviews.text: Love how quiet this thing is when running. Gets baby bottles very clean and never have an issue with water spots or not being totally dry when the unit shuts off. Under heavy use (ran numerous times per day), this thing runs like a champ and gets the job done every time. Also for the price, I think this is a great unit. I used to have a baby brezza sterilizer/dryer and after a few months of daily use it shorted and stopped working. This unit is much quieter during the drying cycle than the baby brezza was.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeli

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new mom purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I use this sterilizer 4-5 times a day and love it! It holds lots of items at once (bottles/parts, pacifiers, pump parts) and dries them all perfectly! Waiting on things to air dry took forever, and this solves that problem. I would say the regular dry/sterilize cycle takes about 30 min. The machine is practically silent. I use distilled water and still get some scaling on the heating plate, but it is easily removed with the vinegar method (I only do this once a week). The company’s instruction video is super helpful - watch it if you are still trying to decide whether to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Walsh

customer_reviews.title: ... Sterilizer for over a week now and it is great. There is lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Sterilizer for over a week now and it is great. There is lots of room. I can fit a day's worth of pumping supplies inside all at once! It dries very well too. I put it on an "extra dry" setting and checked the bottles early and they were bone dry in about 30 minutes, so now I just use the standard "dry" stetting. My only complaint is that even while using distilled water my heating plate is getting a brownish buildup on it. I'm not sure what it is from, but I just descale it every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jess.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I functioned without it.
customer_reviews.text: I typically purchase from Amazon biweekly to monthly and I can honestly say that this was the best purchase I made all year. This thing is amazing. It is sturdy but has a Sleek modern appearance that compliments the kitchen. I Had no idea how necessary this was, I was using initially boiling bottles to sterilize them. This unit practically does everything for you. It steams, dries and acts as a storage for bottles. I also use it for toys and my lo's pacifier. Don't hesitate to purchase this is a must have especially for new moms who may not be sure if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: charmed angel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic. Best sterilizer on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is fantastic! It is oversized which, if you are expressing like my wife, means you can fit a ton of items in here each cycle. Also, would recommend using distilled water when running to cut down on the rust stuff significantly and make the cleaning only necessary once every other week or so. Last, they have absolutely amazing customer service, I had an issue with my sterilizer and without hesitation or delay they shipped me a replacement within 2 days. I’d give a 6th star if I could. Don’t waste your money on a smaller one with most likely much worse or even normal customer service. This has a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like that it has two drying options as I find the Dr Bronws bottles need a little longer dry time to fully dry the vent straws. I also place the vent straws like shown in the pictures to make sure all water gets out. (Just in case you use those bottles too) I recommend using filtered or distilled water (like the manual suggests) to cut back on build up formed on the “heating pad” from hard water, though I do wipe the heating pad down after each use anyway. Simple to use and fits nicely on the counter and under the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Hecate

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was an essential and probably most used baby items in our household. I pump and we bottle feed so I was constantly washing pump parts and bottles. We use this for sanitization and drying at least twice a day. After five months of pretty intense use, it stopped working today. When I turn it on it will go straight to the drying mode and no longer heats up the water to steam. I tried multiple times with no luck. It’s not cheap so keep in mind you may spend $70 and it may only last a few months. To me it was worth it but I wish it worked for longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer in the price point. Love it. Never going back!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works just as expected. Probably the largest volume steamer in this price range. Definitely buy Reverse Osmosis (it'll say "how" the water is filtered on the bottle) only for filling this, fortunately the max fill line is about 1/3 of a cup and RO water is $1/gallon. Get this. You'll thank yourself. It replaced our microwave one and I can't imagine going back. So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: We had a tommee tipee (spelling?) hand me down and wanted to wait until we figured out what we really liked. This sterilizes AND dries, it’s fantastic. We’ve had it for about 6 months now. It can’t fit about 10-12 bottles, we use 9 oz Avent bottles and 8oz Medela bottles. We just take off the little position markers and you can fit it all there. Cleaning of the heating pad is easy with a vinegar/distilled water mix. I recommend to all my new mom friends and family. Has a great design that’s simple and clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water remains on the plate below after certain cycles
customer_reviews.text: I have a newborn who is bottle-fed. I am always scared that he will get some infection from bottles and hence I bought this sterilizer. I have been diligently using it since my purchase. but I am not sure whether it actually does its job after every cycle. In some cycles, the water on plate below remains even though the cycle is complete. My baby is showing signs of cough and cold and I am scared its due to unsterile bottle...
customer_reviews.author: pooja

customer_reviews.title: Dryer is a GAME CHANGER!
customer_reviews.text: As a busy first time mom, let me just say what a difference this has made. I got this when my son was four months and I wish I would have got it sooner. I had the dr browns bottle sterilizer and it was so annoying waiting for hours after for stuff to not even fully dry on my boon drying rack. Especially pump parts!! I also didn’t like my stuff drying out in the open. This dries my stuff so quickly that this past week I’ve been able to build my milk stash since my pump parts dry fast! If I were to get someone a baby shower gift it would be this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aly V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse product ever and the seller is too I ask for the item to be replace it's been a month and I haven't got the replacement yet Apparently the item got lost its so bad it gets dirty in just a few times of usage the heating plates are impossible to clean your cannot clean the bottles white a dirty heating plates don't buy it you will regret it
customer_reviews.author: GOD

customer_reviews.title: Best baby bottle cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!!! I’d buy it again. I only prefer the setting where it dries the bottles also. 100% worth your money. You can actually see the steam coming up it gets so hot and the bottles look and feel like new. Its pretty tall and easy to use. There are three sections the bottom where you put the water about 100ml of distilled water, the middle part which holds up to 6 bottles and the top which holds the parts. It fits all every bottles I’ve put in.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazingly Simple, Quick
customer_reviews.text: First baby: everything must be sterilized. This machine is amazing. Quite a bit of space (six bottles with rings and nipples plus a pacifier). The bottle nipple covers get done second round. It’s quick for a full dry and sterilize: 60 minutes. You’ll be pleased! Use distilled water to avoid buildup. ———- Update: Great customer service- helped to troubleshoot an issue and resolved it fast!
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Chad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use distilled water so ensure no mineral build up. The sterilizer works great. Its easy, you just put distilled water on the bottom (there is a line to measure), put your already-washed baby bottles n stuff in there, and turn the knob to the right and it steams your items. I do it before I go to bed at night and in the morning, i have clean sterilized bottles for my baby the next day.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Saves me so much time instead of waiting for bottles to dry!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sterilizer and dryer in one. Before this I would have to wash the baby bottles and nipples then wait hours for them to dry, wait up for then to dry or wake up earlier to get them ready for daycare. Now I can wash, then place in Papablic and bam! All dry in less than an hour and I dont have to stay up waiting for them to dry. This saves so much time. And its easy to clean, if you simply wipe after use, you wont have to soak to descale.
customer_reviews.author: hazel

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Plenty of space.
customer_reviews.text: I love this but also find brown stains on the heating element. I've started wiping everything down with vinager every other day and that keeps the rust??? Or muck at bay. The heating element is still like new and it does a lovely job sterilizing everything. At first I thought it would be too big but between baby bottles, pacifiers, pumping supplies and etc, it had plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: sparrows3

customer_reviews.title: Holds 7 standard height Dr. Brown bottles!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally bought this after looking at it for so long. It holds 7 standard height Dr. Browns bottles and accessories, if put in a certain way. I love that it completely dries them so I never have to dry bottles or all the little parts. I’ve also used it for pacifiers and small toys and it works like a charm! I did not read the instructions clearly though and it did do some damage to my kitchen cabinet as it lets out steam but that was totally my fault, do not leave it under a cabinet like me!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pitt

customer_reviews.title: You're a wizard Harry
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a trooper, and not like your average stormtrooper that can't hit anything, this beast is a clone trooper that always hits its mark. Pros - it keeps my daughter safe by killing all the rebel scum bacteria. Makes almost no noise. Segmented to take bigger bottles. Element heats long enough to fry 2 eggs. Cons - it's the size of a small microwave. Makes a horrible humidifier that you have to refill every 45 minutes. It does not double as a flotation device despite being full of air.
customer_reviews.author: Autismo Gyeser

customer_reviews.title: She was showing me how easy it was to use
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver. This is coming from my niece that I bought the machine for. She has 2 month old twins and was using the bags you microwave to sterilize. She was showing me how easy it was to use. This was such a great find, she loooves this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for nightly bottle/pump parts washing routine
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I’d do without this! For all those pumping mamas, you know the dishes never end. This makes it so I can basically use as a drying rack except my parts get sanitized and dried. I know when I come back after and hour to put away the parts and bottles will be dried.. no more waiting to air dry. It’s easily the best thing I bought for baby gear that I didn’t even know I needed.
customer_reviews.author: P5473

customer_reviews.title: Short life!
customer_reviews.text: Well, we just bought this in September and it already not working. It no longer turns off when done. The knob used to turn on and off is no longer working so the timer is broken. For the amount we paid it should have lasted muchuch longer. Very upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing_yoda

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sterilize my baby's bottles, pacifiers and other accessories. It's really versatile with different drying options, works quickly and is super efficient. It holds a lot - up to 6 bottles and a bunch of accessories at the same time. the one thing to note, is make sure to keep it in an open area (not below any cupboards or wall art) when it's running because it does release a lot of hot steam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The turn knob has issues
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great initially. After a couple of months the knob does not turn off automatically after sterilizing the bottles.You can rotate the knob to start but it does not turn off once completed leaving the heat on after 3 hours. It remains in the position you set in the start of the cycle and during the process you can rotate the knob freely. The build quality is not solid the design team needs to fix this issue. Otherwise its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Heat plate rusting after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until after just a few weeks the heating plate started to rust :( I follow the directions for water and cleaning usage. Not sure why it’s rusting. I love the multiple features of it and size. Just wish it wasn’t rusting after minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This sanitizer is awesome! Large capacity and great price. I’ve used this multiple times a day for just about two months and I have only one complaint. I’ve found that there is more residue on the heating plate if you don’t clean/rinse items before putting them in. The only negative thing I can say (and the reason for 4 stars and not 5) is that the label for settings has started to come off. I think it’s a combination of the label being next to the heating plate and the occasional rubbing from fingers when setting the dial. Not sure what I’ll do when the whole label comes off. (=
customer_reviews.author: Beks

customer_reviews.title: No hassle Sterilizer & Dryer (better than Dr. Brown’s)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sterilizer and dryer. We hated the Dr. Brown’s sterilizer because it left everything dripping wet without a dryer feature. Also Papablic has much more capacity. The 2nd tier for nipples, caps, etc. is such a vital feature and the cover is curved so it’s roomy at a 2-3 inch height. It runs 8 minutes for sterilizing and 40+ minutes for drying (adjust the turn-dial timer accordingly to how much you put in there).... This sterilizer/dryer was highly recommended by multiple friends. Super happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin J.

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic smell in drying mode
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use it for steaming and drying baby bottles. HOWEVER, in drying mode strong plastic smell comes out of the unit and it seems like it is resulted from a heating component inside or the plastic material surrounding it. I dont feel comfortable breathing around it, and definitely will not keep my baby in the same room when it is drying. Also the rubber feet at the bottom leave yellow marks on my white dresser. Only two stars for its steaming function, ease of use and clean design.
customer_reviews.author: Cattlynn

customer_reviews.title: Its well worth your mula
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to sanitize my babies bottles after feedings. We purchased a cheaper one first. The brand was Munchkin. It lasted I think 3 days and bit the dust. After reading awful reviews about that one I got on amazon and saw this one. It gets 10x hotter than the other sterilizer we first had. It does a great job! Big enough to fit 6, 10 oz bottles with all the nipples and lids.
customer_reviews.author: golfergirl

customer_reviews.title: very helpful. build up does collect in the bottom after time
customer_reviews.text: This is a total time saver. We have had this after a couple of months of struggling with baby bottles. We use glass bottles but we do throw in the occasional plastic toys and pacifiers in there ... I would say be careful with certain plastic toys as this thing is so effective, it has melted some of our small plastic toys ... the plastic didnt turn completely liquid or anything like that, but they did come out deformed lol. all in all a good quality product. we have had it for 8 months now and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: queenie lorilla

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizer does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: *Update- The company reached out and offered a new unit. I really appreciate it. Hi...this product only worked for 3 months. It was going so well until this morning it started drying out the water from the metal plate in literally 30 seconds and then started giving off a burnt rubber scent. I have only used it once a day since February. I am disappointed as it's too soon for the product to be faulty. I wish I could have it replaced or simply refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Nardia M

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, easy to use, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sanitizer/dryer. Easy to use, sleek design, and well-made. I was very pleasantly surprised by this product and packaging. Works very well. Sanitizing AND drying time is a little long, 45 minutes or so, but if you time it correctly between pumping and feeding, you can get it all done. Sanitizing is only 8 minutes if you’re in a hurry and don’t mind a little bit of water. Well worth the money and a better product than some of the very popular brands.
customer_reviews.author: Krombopulous Michael

customer_reviews.title: An hour process for sterilization & dried bottles WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: The knob is a little hard to rotate. But easy to use . A mini dishwasher for just your baby bottles pacifiers . It has two compartments to separate the actual bottle and nipples or small items . It dries the bottles which is a plus for me because the humidity in the plastic bottles disgust me . The steam is released from the top level so it’s best to not to have the machine under the cabinets when on . A little noisy but not unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Jovani

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Water Plate
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT! Ours arrived onAugust 25th. We use it every day and night for our newborn bottles. It started to rust on the water plate within 3 days. Disgusting and waste of money! I’d give it a zero star if only that’s a choice. Thanks for your fraud recommendation, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Begowl

customer_reviews.title: No more drying on the counter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer/sterilizer! I’m an exclusive pumper, and I hated having all my pump parts sitting on the counter drying FOREVER. I can fit 6 flanges or bottles in the bottom area, and lots of small things (nipples for bottles, duckbills, bottle lid pieces) on the top. I also love that the bottom area can be washed in the dishwasher to keep it clean. Don’t let the less expensive price tag (compared to other options) turn you away... you won’t be disappointed with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Hayleigh R. Loose

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby item
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite baby item. I waited too long to buy this thinking I could just wash bottles in the dishwasher. The problem is they came out all wet. This sterilizer/dryer is huge! It can fit lots of bottles/pump parts. The dryer feature only takes about 10 minutes and the sterilizer takes less than an hour. This is a lifesaver if you have a kid at daycare so you’re dealing with lots of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and works well & fast! It’s quite large, really big for the counter top but I love it. Although it’s large for the counter I like the size because it accommodates plenty of items on top and bottles inside. Overall, worth the investment in comparison to a microwave sterilizer. The time it takes to sterilize is great too. The sterilize and dry feature is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia_518

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased this first!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sanitizer to replace a popular one sold in many baby stores that broke after 4 months of use. We love that it dries!! As first time parents at first we opted for a model that had a fast sanitizing cycle but did not dry ( ha ha ha first timers learning curve!) We love that this sanitizer dries and are happy to wait for the 30 mins cycles. It's large enough to fit 6 large bottles and pump parts but not too large that it takes up too much space on the counter. It's easy to clean too. Will definitely buy for friends who are expecting.
customer_reviews.author: SONIA R

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Just wash the bottles and throw them all in there, bottles in bottom and nipples and pacifier, others on top and just turn all the way to the end to sterilize and dry. For the dr brown 8oz bottle, just take the upper layer out and throw everything in there, that’s what I do. It takes about 45min or you can just do the second option which is just sterilize but usually when I go for the bottles they’re already dry. I use it everyday till now it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: pepper&mint

product_meta.title: Papablic Baby Bottle Electric Steam Sterilizer and Dryer
product_meta.description: This 3-in-1 device delivers powerful steam-powered machine with hot air drying technology to keep your baby bottles, breast pump pieces, pacifiers, teethers, and plastic toys clean, dry, and smelling fresh! Papablic is a family business that is committed to supporting the bond between babies and parents. When feeding with a baby bottle, it can be difficult to keep bottles clean and 100% safe, even if washed thoroughly after every use. The machine with penetrating steam that is hotter than your dishwasher and dry the safe way with hot air. Clean up to ten bottles and accessories in the large capacity machine at a time. The tall basket, accessory tray, and lid are all removable so that you can stack the dryer in three different configurations, depending on what you need to clean. It also delivers practical storage to keep your newly baby bottles safe lurking in the air. Simply keep the lid on for over 12 hours of the storage. Feed your baby with peace of mind knowing that your bottles and accessories are thoroughly safe and dried. Like all Papablic products, the 3-in-1 Baby Bottle Sterilizer is backed by a 100% guarantee and was specifically designed with your happy family in mind.
feature_bullets: COMPLETE CLEAN: Penetrating steam at a higher temperature than your dishwasher for reliable sanitization.
3-IN-1 DESIGN: With one twist of a dial, you can sterilize with steam, dry completely with hot air, and deodorize to clean from start to finish.
LARGE CAPACITY: Set-up the sanitizer with three different stacking options to clean up to 11 bottles and accessories like teethers, pacifiers, and plastic toys at once.
CLEAN STORAGE: Keep sanitized bottles and accessories safe in a sterilized environment for over 12 hours.
EASY TO USE: The ergonomic shape makes it easy to carry the machine and take it apart for occasional cleaning, plus it features an intuitive timer design and safe auto shut off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,841 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
